29 #define CONFIG_H 30 31 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 32 // Module selection - Some modules could be avoided 33 // Mandatory modules: rcore, rlgl, utils 34 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 35 #define SUPPORT_MODULE_RSHAPES 1 36 #define SUPPORT_MODULE_RTEXTURES 1 37 #define SUPPORT_MODULE_RTEXT 1 // WARNING: It requires SUPPORT_MODULE_RTEXTURES to load sprite font textures 38 #define SUPPORT_MODULE_RMODELS 1 39 #define SUPPORT_MODULE_RAUDIO 1 40 41 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 42 // Module: rcore - Configuration Flags 43 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 44 // Camera module is included (rcamera.h) and multiple predefined cameras are available: free, 1st/3rd person, orbital 45 #define SUPPORT_CAMERA_SYSTEM 1 46 // Gestures module is included (rgestures.h) to support gestures detection: tap, hold, swipe, drag 47 #define SUPPORT_GESTURES_SYSTEM 1 48 // Mouse gestures are directly mapped like touches and processed by gestures system 49 #define SUPPORT_MOUSE_GESTURES 1 50 // Reconfigure standard input to receive key inputs, works with SSH connection. 51 #define SUPPORT_SSH_KEYBOARD_RPI 1 52 // Setting a higher resolution can improve the accuracy of time-out intervals in wait functions. 53 // However, it can also reduce overall system performance, because the thread scheduler switches tasks more often. 54 #define SUPPORT_WINMM_HIGHRES_TIMER 1 55 // Use busy wait loop for timing sync, if not defined, a high-resolution timer is set up and used 56 //#define SUPPORT_BUSY_WAIT_LOOP 1 57 // Use a partial-busy wait loop, in this case frame sleeps for most of the time, but then runs a busy loop at the end for accuracy 58 #define SUPPORT_PARTIALBUSY_WAIT_LOOP 59 // Wait for events passively (sleeping while no events) instead of polling them actively every frame 60 //#define SUPPORT_EVENTS_WAITING 1 61 // Allow automatic screen capture of current screen pressing F12, defined in KeyCallback() 62 #define SUPPORT_SCREEN_CAPTURE 1 63 // Allow automatic gif recording of current screen pressing CTRL+F12, defined in KeyCallback() 64 #define SUPPORT_GIF_RECORDING 1 65 // Support CompressData() and DecompressData() functions 66 #define SUPPORT_COMPRESSION_API 1 67 // Support automatic generated events, loading and recording of those events when required 68 //#define SUPPORT_EVENTS_AUTOMATION 1 69 // Support custom frame control, only for advance users 70 // By default EndDrawing() does this job: draws everything + SwapScreenBuffer() + manage frame timing + PollInputEvents() 71 // Enabling this flag allows manual control of the frame processes, use at your own risk 72 //#define SUPPORT_CUSTOM_FRAME_CONTROL 1 73 74 // rcore: Configuration values 75 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 76 #define MAX_FILEPATH_CAPACITY 8192 // Maximum file paths capacity 77 #define MAX_FILEPATH_LENGTH 4096 // Maximum length for filepaths (Linux PATH_MAX default value) 78 79 #define MAX_KEYBOARD_KEYS 512 // Maximum number of keyboard keys supported 80 #define MAX_MOUSE_BUTTONS 8 // Maximum number of mouse buttons supported 81 #define MAX_GAMEPADS 4 // Maximum number of gamepads supported 82 #define MAX_GAMEPAD_AXIS 8 // Maximum number of axis supported (per gamepad) 83 #define MAX_GAMEPAD_BUTTONS 32 // Maximum number of buttons supported (per gamepad) 84 #define MAX_TOUCH_POINTS 8 // Maximum number of touch points supported 85 #define MAX_KEY_PRESSED_QUEUE 16 // Maximum number of keys in the key input queue 86 #define MAX_CHAR_PRESSED_QUEUE 16 // Maximum number of characters in the char input queue 87 88 #define MAX_DECOMPRESSION_SIZE 64 // Max size allocated for decompression in MB 89 90 91 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 92 // Module: rlgl - Configuration values 93 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 94 95 // Enable OpenGL Debug Context (only available on OpenGL 4.3) 96 //#define RLGL_ENABLE_OPENGL_DEBUG_CONTEXT 1 97 98 // Show OpenGL extensions and capabilities detailed logs on init 99 //#define RLGL_SHOW_GL_DETAILS_INFO 1 100 101 //#define RL_DEFAULT_BATCH_BUFFER_ELEMENTS 4096 // Default internal render batch elements limits 102 #define RL_DEFAULT_BATCH_BUFFERS 1 // Default number of batch buffers (multi-buffering) 103 #define RL_DEFAULT_BATCH_DRAWCALLS 256 // Default number of batch draw calls (by state changes: mode, texture) 104 #define RL_DEFAULT_BATCH_MAX_TEXTURE_UNITS 4 // Maximum number of textures units that can be activated on batch drawing (SetShaderValueTexture()) 105 106 #define RL_MAX_MATRIX_STACK_SIZE 32 // Maximum size of internal Matrix stack 107 108 #define RL_MAX_SHADER_LOCATIONS 32 // Maximum number of shader locations supported 109 110 #define RL_CULL_DISTANCE_NEAR 0.01 // Default projection matrix near cull distance 111 #define RL_CULL_DISTANCE_FAR 1000.0 // Default projection matrix far cull distance 112 113 // Default shader vertex attribute names to set location points 114 // NOTE: When a new shader is loaded, the following locations are tried to be set for convenience 115 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_POSITION "vertexPosition" // Bound by default to shader location: 0 116 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_TEXCOORD "vertexTexCoord" // Bound by default to shader location: 1 117 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_NORMAL "vertexNormal" // Bound by default to shader location: 2 118 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_COLOR "vertexColor" // Bound by default to shader location: 3 119 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_TANGENT "vertexTangent" // Bound by default to shader location: 4 120 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_TEXCOORD2 "vertexTexCoord2" // Bound by default to shader location: 5 121 122 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_UNIFORM_NAME_MVP "mvp" // model-view-projection matrix 123 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_UNIFORM_NAME_VIEW "matView" // view matrix 124 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_UNIFORM_NAME_PROJECTION "matProjection" // projection matrix 125 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_UNIFORM_NAME_MODEL "matModel" // model matrix 126 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_UNIFORM_NAME_NORMAL "matNormal" // normal matrix (transpose(inverse(matModelView)) 127 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_UNIFORM_NAME_COLOR "colDiffuse" // color diffuse (base tint color, multiplied by texture color) 128 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_SAMPLER2D_NAME_TEXTURE0 "texture0" // texture0 (texture slot active 0) 129 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_SAMPLER2D_NAME_TEXTURE1 "texture1" // texture1 (texture slot active 1) 130 #define RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_SAMPLER2D_NAME_TEXTURE2 "texture2" // texture2 (texture slot active 2) 131 132 133 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 134 // Module: rshapes - Configuration Flags 135 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 136 // Use QUADS instead of TRIANGLES for drawing when possible 137 // Some lines-based shapes could still use lines 138 #define SUPPORT_QUADS_DRAW_MODE 1 139 140 141 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 142 // Module: rtextures - Configuration Flags 143 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 144 // Select the desired fileformats to be supported for image data loading 145 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PNG 1 146 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_BMP 1 147 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_TGA 1 148 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_JPG 1 149 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_GIF 1 150 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_QOI 1 151 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PSD 1 152 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_DDS 1 153 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_HDR 1 154 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PIC 1 155 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PNM 1 156 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_KTX 1 157 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_ASTC 1 158 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PKM 1 159 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PVR 1 160 161 // Support image export functionality (.png, .bmp, .tga, .jpg, .qoi) 162 #define SUPPORT_IMAGE_EXPORT 1 163 // Support procedural image generation functionality (gradient, spot, perlin-noise, cellular) 164 #define SUPPORT_IMAGE_GENERATION 1 165 // Support multiple image editing functions to scale, adjust colors, flip, draw on images, crop... 166 // If not defined, still some functions are supported: ImageFormat(), ImageCrop(), ImageToPOT() 167 #define SUPPORT_IMAGE_MANIPULATION 1 168 169 170 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 171 // Module: rtext - Configuration Flags 172 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 173 // Default font is loaded on window initialization to be available for the user to render simple text 174 // NOTE: If enabled, uses external module functions to load default raylib font 175 #define SUPPORT_DEFAULT_FONT 1 176 // Selected desired font fileformats to be supported for loading 177 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_FNT 1 178 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_TTF 1 179 180 // Support text management functions 181 // If not defined, still some functions are supported: TextLength(), TextFormat() 182 #define SUPPORT_TEXT_MANIPULATION 1 183 184 // rtext: Configuration values 185 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 186 #define MAX_TEXT_BUFFER_LENGTH 1024 // Size of internal static buffers used on some functions: 187 // TextFormat(), TextSubtext(), TextToUpper(), TextToLower(), TextToPascal(), TextSplit() 188 #define MAX_TEXTSPLIT_COUNT 128 // Maximum number of substrings to split: TextSplit() 189 190 191 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 192 // Module: rmodels - Configuration Flags 193 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 194 // Selected desired model fileformats to be supported for loading 195 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_OBJ 1 196 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_MTL 1 197 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_IQM 1 198 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_GLTF 1 199 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_VOX 1 200 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_M3D 1 201 // Support procedural mesh generation functions, uses external par_shapes.h library 202 // NOTE: Some generated meshes DO NOT include generated texture coordinates 203 #define SUPPORT_MESH_GENERATION 1 204 205 // rmodels: Configuration values 206 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 207 #define MAX_MATERIAL_MAPS 12 // Maximum number of shader maps supported 208 #define MAX_MESH_VERTEX_BUFFERS 7 // Maximum vertex buffers (VBO) per mesh 209 210 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 211 // Module: raudio - Configuration Flags 212 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 213 // Desired audio fileformats to be supported for loading 214 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_WAV 1 215 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_OGG 1 216 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_MP3 1 217 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_QOA 1 218 //#define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_FLAC 1 219 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_XM 1 220 #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_MOD 1 221 222 // raudio: Configuration values 223 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 224 #define AUDIO_DEVICE_FORMAT ma_format_f32 // Device output format (miniaudio: float-32bit) 225 #define AUDIO_DEVICE_CHANNELS 2 // Device output channels: stereo 226 #define AUDIO_DEVICE_SAMPLE_RATE 0 // Device sample rate (device default) 227 228 #define MAX_AUDIO_BUFFER_POOL_CHANNELS 16 // Maximum number of audio pool channels 229 230 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 231 // Module: utils - Configuration Flags 232 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 233 // Standard file io library (stdio.h) included 234 #define SUPPORT_STANDARD_FILEIO 1 235 // Show TRACELOG() output messages 236 // NOTE: By default LOG_DEBUG traces not shown 237 #define SUPPORT_TRACELOG 1 238 //#define SUPPORT_TRACELOG_DEBUG 1 239 240 // utils: Configuration values 241 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 242 #define MAX_TRACELOG_MSG_LENGTH 256 // Max length of one trace-log message 243 244 #endif // CONFIG_H
